Definition: Broader location where the data collection occurred within  Panther Swamp National Wildlife Refuge, Yazoo, Mississippi, USA
Independent plot location names within each site. All the plots were composed of old-growth, bottomland hardwood forests with similar canopy covers
Month of deployment (August, September, or November)
Date of detection following the day/month/year format
Wildlife species detected on the corresponding camera
The number of individuals observed on the detection
Date of camera deployment at the plot following the day/month/year format
Camera trap design (V = Vertical, H = Horizontal)
